decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Planning Statement Jan2016. Received: 08/02/2016. PA-01. Received: 06/04/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 2 - No deliveries shall be taken at or despatched from the site outside the hours of 07:00 - 23:00.
Condition : 3 - The on-site car wash shall not be used outside the hours of 07:00 - 23:00.
Condition : 4 - The on-site shop shall not be open to customers outside the hours of 07:00 - 23:00.

Condition : 5 - No activity shall be carried out at the premises between the hours of 11.00pm and 7.00am with the exception of filling of vehicles with petrol and the associated receipt of payment which shall not be carried out at the premises between the hours of 11.00 pm and 6.00 am
Condition : 6 - All boundary walls shall be maintained at their present height, and the front boundary enclosure shall not exceed 750mm from footpath level.
Condition : 7 - The fuel pumps and openings to the fuel storage tanks shall be not less than 4.25m behind the highway boundary.
Condition : 8 - Vehicles shall not be sold or displayed on the forecourt of this petrol filling station.
description: Variation of Condition 3 to change the opening hours from 07:00 am to 06:00 am following planning permission 01137/403-405/P23 dated 14/12/1983 for erection of petrol service station with car servicing
